name: Landhaus Johannes
description: Take the holiday you always dreamed of in one of our pleasant apartments in the holiday region mayrhofen-hippach. We, as a family business, place great importance on the well being of our guests. Our house is situated in a wonderfully quiet position, sun loungers, car park and bread delivery service are all available. The Penken and Ahorn lifts (ski run to the front door), cross country ski trail, toboggan run, adventure swimming pool, tennis courts and town centre are all between 2 and 5 minutes away.

Drive straight ahead at the roundabout in Mayrhofen and turn left at "Einfahrt Mitte", turn right at the junction with the high street and after approx. 300 metres over the bridge, and turn left at the "Gasthof Brücke" towards the Ahorn lifts. Take a sharp right after the Café "Everest",(following our signposts). and after approx. 100 metres our Landhaus can be found at the end of this road.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower and bath, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
The “Gruenberg” apartment is ideal for 2 - 5 persons. 
The apartment is tastefully and comfortably furnished and features an entrance hall, 2 bedrooms, living room/bedroom, kitchen, cosy dining area, tiled stove, bathroom, shower and 2 WC`s, large balcony, safe, radio, cable TV, WLAN Internet, and telephone. We spoil our guests with fresh-smelling bed linen, plenty of towels and full sets of crockery and kitchen utensils.
To provide maximum comfort and for the good of your health, we kindly ask you not to smoke in the apartments.
Type of board: Self-catering
Standard occupancy: Sleeps 2-5 persons
Number of beds: 2 double beds, 1 double sofa bed
Location: New building, Top floor, Park-Gardenside

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower and bath, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description:
The “Ahorn and Penken” apartment is ideal for 2 - 3 persons. 
The apartment is tastefully and comfortably furnished and features an entrance hall, bedroom, living room/bedroom, kitchenette, cosy dining area, tiled stove, bathroom, shower and WC, large balcony, safe, radio, cable TV, WLAN Internet, and telephone. We spoil our guests with fresh-smelling bed linen, plenty of towels and full sets of crockery and kitchen utensils.
To provide maximum comfort and for the good of your health, we kindly ask you not to smoke in the apartments.
Type of board: Self-catering
Standard occupancy: Sleeps 2-3 persons
Number of beds: 1 double bed, 1 double sofa bed
Location: 1st floor garden/parking side
